title: bcd-watch: BCD changes (weekly)
description: A feed that summarizes changes to BCD weekly

items.content_html:
BCD Changes Report, Mon Aug 26 2024

Summary of BCD changes from available BCD releases in this timeframe: Tuesday, 13 August 2024 to Saturday, 24 August 2024 ğŸ”—

Browser Support Changes: +1, -0

Support increases (1)

css

  1. css â properties â reading-flow
    Added to Chrome  â  1 of 3 engines

BCD Metadata Changes: 197

Show all 197 changes

Note: The following represent changes to BCD metadata keys in the reported time period. Keys are not implementations, and they don't represent commitments toward implementation, etc. A new key occuring is perhaps a signal that some implementer was serious enough to add the key. Many of the features that are 'removed' are usually just 'moved' or 'renamed', but we don't have great ways to highlight that.

Backfilled entries (57)

The entries in this section saw support information change since the report on Tuesday, 13 August 2024, but all the supported browser versions given were more than a couple of months old. Typically, these are cases of support information being updated long after the support actually landed in a browser, but nobody ever updated the BCD entry.

html

  1. html â elements â textarea â placeholder â line_breaks
    Backfilled from  â  3 of 3 engines

New entries (68)

The entries in this section were not found in BCD on Tuesday, 13 August 2024, but are now present. These usually do not have any support information attached to them, and often have no corresponding MDN page. Sometimes, entries that appear here also appear in the next section (â€œRemoved BCD entriesâ€) because of a Working Group deciding on a rename.

The entries in this section were found in BCD on Tuesday, 13 August 2024, but are no longer present. The reasons for this removal can be anything from an experimental proposal that was never supported to a property or value being renamed to something else.
